00203 template <int Dimensions>
00204 inline bool TIndex<Dimensions>::IsValid() const
00205 {
00206        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00207               if (m_elements[i] < 0){

00212        return true;

00231 {

00387 template <int Dimensions>
00388 bool TIndex<Dimensions>::IsInside(const TIndex& boundaries) const
00389 {
00390        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00391               I_ASSERT(m_elements[i] >= 0);
00392 
00393               if (m_elements[i] >= boundaries.m_elements[i]){
00394                      return false;
00395               }
00396        }
00397 
00398        return true;
00399 }

00402 template <int Dimensions>
00403 bool TIndex<Dimensions>::Increase(const TIndex& boundaries)
00404 {
00405        I_ASSERT(IsInside(boundaries));
00406 
00407        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00408               if (m_elements[i] < boundaries.m_elements[i] - 1){
00409                      m_elements[i]++;
00410                      for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j){
00411                             m_elements[j] = 0;
00412                      }
00413 
00414                      return true;
00415               }
00416        }
00417 
00418        SetAllTo(0);
00419 
00420        return false;
00421 }
00422 
00423 
00424 template <int Dimensions>
00425 bool TIndex<Dimensions>::Decrease(const TIndex& boundaries)
00426 {
00427        I_ASSERT(IsInside(boundaries));
00428 
00429        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00430               if (m_elements[i] > 0){
00431                      m_elements[i]--;
00432 
00433                      for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j){
00434                             m_elements[j] = boundaries.m_elements[j] - 1;
00435                      }
00436 
00437                      return true;
00438               }
00439        }
00440 
00441        for (int j = 0; j < Dimensions; ++j){
00442               m_elements[j] = boundaries.m_elements[j] - 1;
00443        }
00444 
00445        return false;
00446 }

00449 template <int Dimensions>
00450 int TIndex<Dimensions>::GetProductVolume() const
00451 {
00452        int retVal = 1;
00453 
00454        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00455               retVal *= m_elements[i];
00456        }
00457 
00458        return retVal;
00459 }
